column3: Re-run of prior closing data using latest model and assumptions.
Run results as at the last day of the closing month.
Asset shares calculated according to Valuation requirements as at last day of closing month.
Ensures consistency in the opening AoC logic.
Move from opening to closing run date.
Allow for adjustments over the period.
Allow for investment returns over the period.
Allow for premiums over the period.
Allow for closing death uplift factor.
Allow for mortality charges over the period.
Restate the deductions used in the opening position.
Remove records which have exited over the period.
Re-run using latest view of opening data.
Ensures consistency in the closing AoC logic.
Allow for restated openining adjustments (eg. mutual bonus).
Allow for closing guaranteed death benefit.
Allow for actual roll-forward of data (eg. NPDDs).
Allow for deductions over the period such as AMCs and IMCs.
Allow for closing exit bonus rate.
Allow for statuses transitioning to PUP.
Move to closing data for existing business.
Add new records which have arisen over the period.
Restate the returns used in the opening position.
